fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the abilities of the roles you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be given two random Mafia roles. Those are your roles, but you win with the Unseen.
- You will not gain permanent defense, even if your role grants that.
- You will not get access to the factional chat, you will also not get access to the factional kill.
- You may only get one Mafia (Head) or one Mafia (Killing) role.
- You may multitask.
